original_text: For if you forgive others their trespasses, your heavenly Father will also forgive you,
korean_text: 너희가 사람의 잘못을 용서하면 너희 하늘 아버지께서도 너희 잘못을 용서하시려니와

sentences.original_text: For if you forgive others their trespasses,
